page.title: 11BUSINESSES IN PLYMTREE
page.content: There are a handful of businesses in Plymtree of a very diverse nature which exist alongside the farming community. We have a GENERAL STORES & POST OFFICE and next door a PUBLIC HOUSE & RESTAURANT. A SADDLERY and a BED & BREAKFAST business. A WINE MER- CHANT who runs his business from Plymtree and a Cottage Industry which supplies WOODCRAFT TOYS & FURNITURE. We have a CAR & COMMERCIALS REPAIRS firm which also offers a SIGNWRITING service,and alongside this exists a BUILDING & JOINERY firm. All these businesses not only serve the village people but offer a service outside Plymtree.
